title: The Haunting of Tyler May
description: The Haunting of Tyler May (book one of the Tyler May series). A young adult, fantasy adventure by B J MEARS. As Tyler May empties her classmate's bag she discovers a secret that turns her life upside down and challenges her perception of the known world. She begins a journey that takes her from the hunted to the hunter; from a disbeliever to the keeper of the truth. Will she and her friends have the courage to stand together and face the sinister forces that threaten humanity? As each day passes, Tyler must decide how far she is willing to go. After all, she is just one teenage girl. Also available in this series: The Thieves of Antiquity (book two of the Tyler May series).
author: B.J. Mears
